edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model.dao

Interface ApodDao


  • public interface ApodDao
    Declares basic CRUD operations for Apod instances in the local database, using Room annotations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int delete(Apod... apods)
      Deletes one or more Apod instances from local database.
      List<Apod> findAll()
      Selects and returns all Apod instances in the local database, sorting the result in descending date order.
      Apod findFirstByDate(edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date date)
      Selects and returns the single Apod instance (or null) for the specified Date.
      List<Long> insert(Apod... apods)
      Inserts one or more Apod instances into the local database.

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        List<Long> insert(Apod... apods)
        Inserts one or more Apod instances into the local database. Any primary or unique key constraint violations will result in the existing records being retained.
        Parameters:
        apods - Apod instance(s) to be inserted.
        Returns:
        inserted record ID(s).

      • findFirstByDate

        Apod findFirstByDate(edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date date)
        Selects and returns the single Apod instance (or null) for the specified Date.
        Parameters:
        date - desired Apod Date.
        Returns:
        Apod instance if found in database; null otherwise.

      • findAll

        List<Apod> findAll()
        Selects and returns all Apod instances in the local database, sorting the result in descending date order.
        Returns:
        all Apod instances in local database.

      • delete

        int delete(Apod... apods)
        Deletes one or more Apod instances from local database.
        Parameters:
        apods - instances of Apod to be deleted from database.
        Returns:
        number of records deleted.
